I have added my files with _interaction graphics_ here !!

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)

library(plotly)
```
```{r}
data("ny_noaa") 
ny_noaa_new =
  ny_noaa %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  select(id,date,tmax,tmin,snow,prcp) %>%
  filter(
    date == 	"1981-01-01"
  )
```


```{r}
ny_noaa_new %>%
  #mutate(text_label = str_c("ID", id))
plot_ly(
   x = ~tmax, y = ~tmin, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
   color = ~id)

```
